name: zoraxy
description: Zoraxy is a self-hosted reverse proxy, load balancer, and firewall with a friendly web interface. It simplifies routing, SSL, and security rules for homelabs and small deployments.
features: Reverse proxy: Route incoming requests to backend services based on domain names and path patterns.
SSL management: Automatically obtain and renew SSL certificates from Let's Encrypt with ACME protocol support.
Load balancing: Distribute traffic across multiple backend servers with health checks and failover capabilities.
Web firewall: Protect services with built-in firewall rules, rate limiting, and IP blocking features.
Access control: Restrict access to services by IP address, geographic location, or authentication requirements.
Web interface: Configure all proxy rules, SSL certificates, and security settings through an intuitive dashboard.
Custom headers: Add, modify, or remove HTTP headers for requests and responses to meet application requirements.
WebSocket support: Proxy WebSocket connections for real-time applications alongside standard HTTP traffic.
Logging and analytics: Monitor traffic patterns, response times, and errors with detailed access logs.
Redirect rules: Set up HTTP to HTTPS redirects and custom URL rewriting rules without backend changes.
Authentication proxy: Add authentication layers to services that don't have built-in user management.
Docker integration: Automatically discover and configure proxies for Docker containers with label-based configuration.
